Posts.Content: Israel, Yes, as far as I know. The radiotherapy ladies will try to work around my two days in Manchester by starting 2 days sooner than planned & another day 12 July, is a holiday here in N. Ireland, so the one I miss then will will be stuck on the end of my 3 weeks. All in all, I have 2 days, I think, before I go to Mallorca.  The nurse mentioned creams, so I presume I’ll get those when I start. I asked for a later start time as I hope to travel via train, to avoid stressing with traffic & parking. An early train would cost me £9 return whilst a later one (after 9:30) would be £6. Mine were all lovely & I just wish the 28 June would be tomorrow! Best wishes for yourself & I hope they can work around your holiday too! M x
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ June 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: My Onc appt is 11th June. Hoping my start date for RT is quite soon as hubby & I have a 2/3 day break booked in Manchester & a family fortnight hol in Mallorca starting 26th July, ( both booked long before my BC diagnosis). Hoping they might be a little flexible. Good luck to all xxx Melanie
